title: Windows 8.1 Pro VL X64 Update 3 ESD OEM en-GB April 2015 by Gene
description:
[b]* Windows 8.1 Pro VL X64 Update 3 ESD OEM en-GB April 2015


[ RELEASE INFO ]


* File: W81.2in1.ESD.OEM.en-GB.Apr2015.iso

* Source: dvd 6050881

* Size: 3,68GB
* Format: Bootable ISO

* CRC32: 42376d07
* MD5 : 35874e5b58c3fbd6c33209554425891a
* SHA-1: a78bb4bb6972a4cae226d8a9f2b3ac70f85b70df

* Language: en-GB [ English - GB ]

[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

* Windows 8.1 Pro VL
* Windows 8.1 Pro VL - - OEM-Activated

[ CONTENTS ]

* Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:

* .NET Framework 2.0, 3.0 & 3.5
* .NET Framework 4.5.2
* Important & Security Updates - 2015-04-14

* Setupcomplete / Post-install:

* KB890930
* Defender Updates

[ FEATURES ]

* Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)
* install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)

[ COMMENTS & ACTIVATION INFO ]

* OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) will automatically activate

* (if HP, Asus, Toshiba, etc), and input manufacturers login screen,

* wallpaper, system properties logo and User Account logo.

* If you choose non-OEM (eg Custom Build) you can activate with

* KMSpico in WPI screen at end of install.

* Testing has shown that if you choose OEM for Custom Build, wallpaper,etc still

* gets applied but will not automatically activate. In this instance use KMS.

* A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.

* To Pre-Activate Windows, select "KMSPico" and "Begin Install".

* To skip activation, just click on "Exit".

* Activator:

* KMSpico v10.0.4 Portable Edition
[ Potential False Positive Virus Alarm ]

[ INSTALLATION ]

* Create bootable USB (highly recommended) with Rufus (attached)
* or, if you really must; burn to DVD at slow speed.


* Hope you will enjoy this release!

* Regards,
* Generation2 [/b]
